entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 04:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -15.1°C

Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: WSW 41 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
